original_text: When he was alive, I caused him to make people very afraid. But Pharaoh and all his great army will lie in their graves among other people who died in battle. They will lie with people who do not belong to God. That is what I, the Almighty Lord, have said.’ When he was alive, I caused him to make people very afraid. But Pharaoh and all his great army will lie in their graves among other people who died in battle. They will lie with people who do not belong to God. That is what I, the Almighty Lord, have said.’ When he was alive, I caused him to make people very afraid. But Pharaoh and all his great army will lie in their graves among other people who died in battle. They will lie with people who do not belong to God. That is what I, the Almighty Lord, have said.’
korean_text: 내가 바로로 하여금 생존하는 사람들의 세상에서 사람을 두렵게 하게 하였으나 이제는 그가 그 모든 무리와 더불어 할례를 받지 못한 자 곧 칼에 죽임을 당한 자와 함께 누이리로다 주 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: When he was alive,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 살아 있을 때,

sentences.original_text: I caused him to make people very afraid.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그로 하여금 사람들을 매우 두렵게 하게 했다.

sentences.original_text: But Pharaoh and all his great army
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 바로와 그의 모든 위대한 군대는

sentences.original_text: will lie in their graves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 무덤에 누울 것이며

sentences.original_text: among other people who died in battle.
sentences.korean_translation: 전투에서 죽은 다른 사람들 사이에 있을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They will lie with people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사람들과 함께 누울 것이며

sentences.original_text: who do not belong to God.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께 속하지 않은 사람들과 함께일 것이다.

sentences.original_text: That is what I, the Almighty Lord, have said.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 나 전능하신 주께서 말씀하신 것이다.'
